titleStmt.title: Clavis medicinæ: or, The practice of physick reformed wherein is described the nature and cause of most diseases and the select way of cure for the same. A method contrary to all authors in being. By Jeremiah Love, doctor of pysick [sic].
titleStmt.author: Love, Jeremiah.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Henry Brome, at the Gun in St. Paul Church-Yard, at the west end,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.

place.placeName: the Gun in St. Paul Church-Yard, at the west end
